about_the_game:
Dive into "Guardians of the Afterlife," a journey where the afterlife is just the beginning. As a soul cast from the physical realm, players must navigate the mysteries of the beyond, guided by the enigmatic Guardians.



With a unique blend of strategic choices and a deeply engaging narrative, this visual novel challenges you to reclaim your lost memories and fight for another chance at life.



Set in breathtaking ethereal realms, each step unfolds secrets of your past, testing your resolve and determination to undo the fate that befell you. "Guardians of the Afterlife" isn't just a visual novel game—it's a quest for redemption, offering a profound exploration of life, death, and what lies in between.



Guardians of the Afterlife is built around the concept of "soul reclamation." Players must gather lost soul shards scattered across various realms, each guarded by formidable foes.



Leveraging a unique blend of skills acquired from the Guardians and the environments themselves, players will battle against ethereal creatures, and make choices that affect their journey and the world around them.



Guardians of the Afterlife presents a unique opportunity to invest in a game that combines rich storytelling with innovative gameplay mechanics. The game's unique premise, centered on the concept of battling through the afterlife to reclaim one's place in the physical world. This game's blend of strategic choices, narrative depth, and breathtaking visuals, "Guardians of the Afterlife" is set to redefine the visual novel expectation and deliver a lasting gaming experience.

Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.7
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card with at least 512MB Shared VRAM & openGL 2.0 support
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any Mac-compatible sound card

Explore the mysterious voids between realms, while hunting down the secrets of your past and seize another chance at life in this compelling adventure.
